title: Neo Sans SC
content:
Does anyone know if there is small caps/expert set available for Neo Sans?

It’s looking doubtful as I can’t find it anywhere.

If not can anyone recommend a similar face that has small caps?

I thank you.

 [‹ ART DECO FONT MUSETTE - Is there anything similar available?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080209134016/http:/typophile.com/node/41758 "Go to previous forum topic") [RYHS CHATHAM cdbox-font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080209134016/http:/typophile.com/node/41763 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Tom_E

comments.content:
Hi Tom,

here are a couple of sans faces that have small caps:

- [Botanika](http://web.archive.org/web/20080209134016/http:/www.suitcasetype.com/index.php?lmut=en&part=fonts&font=8)
- [JAF Facit](http://web.archive.org/web/20080209134016/http:/justanotherfoundry.com/Facit/index.htm)
- [Klavika](http://web.archive.org/web/20080209134016/http:/www.processtypefoundry.com/typefaces/klavika/features.html)
- [FF Meta](http://web.archive.org/web/20080209134016/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/fontfont/ff_meta_ot_book/)
- [Apex New](http://web.archive.org/web/20080209134016/http:/vllg.com/Lux/Section/mudTyper+Weights/)
- [Morgan](http://web.archive.org/web/20080209134016/http:/vllg.com/Feliciano/Morgan/mudTyper+Weights/)
Thanks Florian, some interesting options there.
